Name: Masala Dosa
Ingredients: Rice flour, Urad dal, Fenugreek seeds, Potatoes, Onions, Green chilies, Ginger, Turmeric powder, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Oil, Salt, Water

Name: Pongal
Ingredients: Rice, Moong dal, Black pepper, Cumin seeds, Ginger, Ghee, Cashew nuts

Name: Vada
Ingredients: Urad dal, Green chilies, Ginger, Curry leaves, Asafoetida, Salt, Oil

Name: Sambar
Ingredients: Toor dal, Mixed vegetables (like carrots, beans, potatoes, drumsticks), Tamarind, Sambar powder, Turmeric powder, Asafoetida, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Dry red chilies, Oil, Salt, Water
